en.name: Top 10 with KPI (flexible)
en.description: Top 10 with KPI and flexible layout.
en.icon_tooltip: Top 10 with KPI and flexible layout.

color._translation: Set font color - NOT IN USE
color._tooltip: NOT IN USE - Change the color on every element separately

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default normal

setCDN._translation: Enable regional number format (not visible in Designer)
setCDN._tooltip: Changes the thousand and decimal separator to the WebFOCUS system setting - not visible in Designer

numberOfTopEntries._translation: Number of top entries to be shown
numberOfTopEntries._tooltip: 1 to 10 top entries could be shown

widgetWidth._tooltip: Define the minimum and maximum width used by the widget

minimumWidgetWidth._tooltip: Define the minimum width used by the widget

maximumWidgetWidth._tooltip: Define the maximum width used by the widget

fontWeight._tooltip: Set font weight for the headline text
fontWeight._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font weight)

color._tooltip: Set font color for the headline text

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the headline text

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the headline text
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

disableHeadline._tooltip: Disable and remove the headline text

overwriteHeadline._tooltip: Overwrite text in headline with custom text

fontWeight._tooltip: Set font weight for the dimension text

color._tooltip: Set font color for the dimension text

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the dimension text

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the dimension text
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

textAlign._tooltip: Set text alignment for the dimension text

fontWeight._tooltip: Set font weight for the measure number
fontWeight._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font weight)

color._tooltip: Set font color for the measure number

fontSize._tooltip: Set font size for the measure number

fontStyle._tooltip: Set font style for the measure number
fontStyle._valueTooltip: Default inherit (inherit from upper level font style)

decimalPlaces._tooltip: Set decimal places for the measure number

hideMeasureNumber._tooltip: Disable and remove the measure number

percentValue._tooltip: Show a percent sign for the measure number
